class LinkProcessor:
    def identify_link_type(self, link_url: str) -> str:
        """è¯†åˆ«é“¾æ¥ç±»å‹"""
        if link_url.startswith('#'):

        elif link_url.startswith(('![', '![')):

        else:
            return LinkType.UNKNOWN
